channel.title: Npc when login
channel.description: Well i want to make that you can choose in the begginning what npc you want to be and you cannot change it. and when you log in again ur still the npc. and it would also be nice if you choose a npc that it gives you items (depending on what npc u choose) Does anyone know how to make this?

item.title: Npc when login
item.dc:creator: @magep00ner12 magep00ner12
item.description:
@magep00ner12 wrote:

Well i want to make that you can choose in the begginning what npc you want to be and you cannot change it.
and when you log in again ur still the npc. and it would also be nice if you choose a npc that it gives you items (depending on what npc u choose)
Does anyone know how to make this?
